𒁕𒀊𒁀𒆪 da-ab-ba-ku 𓆓𓃀𓂧 δabaku > speak 𓆓𓂧 davk talk

𓆓 𓂧 reading continuum between D-C / Q-D

𓆓 𓂧 Dice 𓂧𓌪 𒅗 DUG talk tongue ⇔ song = 𒊕 saĝ sagen
𓆓 𓂧 chat / ⲥⲁϫⲓ / said / cite / zitier / 𒆠 𒉈 𒈠 qí-bí-ma :
𓆓 𓂧 discuss / qais/ quoth / quest / quatschen / cwæd / 𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 / quiz / ϩⲓⲱⲓϣ /qiz / 𐌵𐌹𐍃𐍃 / 𐌵𐌹𐌸𐌰𐌽 ⇔ Hadith

𒁲 DI present participle and infinitive stem of 𒅗 (du₁₁, dug₄ /dug/, “to talk, speak”

𒅗 DUG ⇔ 𒊔 SAG šogh = Schopf (enough) 𒊕 SAG > sagen

𓆓 copra > quvraⁿ > quran
𓆓 copra > Geb in 𓆓𓂧 "Gebot"
𒋡𒁍 qa-pu "Gebot" quopt > quote
𒋡𒁍 command, speak, to say 2. to fall down, collapse

QUOTH < 𒅗𒆤 kiti <
𒆠𒁉𒋾 qí-bi-ti Gebot 𐌲𐌰𐌱𐌰𐌹𐌳 !!!
𒆠𒉈𒈠 qí-bí-ma quoth

Dictum 𓂧 𓏏 𓏜 ditum madita :

𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓏜 MATTER
𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓏜 | matter, affair |
𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓈓 | 𐌼𐌰𐌸𐌻𐌴𐌹𐌽 “speech,discourse” | moutheln mauscheln masln ⇔ quasseln
𓌃 𓂧 𓏏 𓏥 | speak, address (someone), speech, word, plea |

Vast spectrum of derived words:
dice duce doceō teach docket document token < take < track trag > 𓈍 tag 𓏴 > ✓ tick ticket ⇔ title tablet 𓇼 𓏏 𓇳 Tag 𒌓?

𓎡 𓄿 𓀁 𓆑 quoth : he will say, 𐍃𐌰𐌺𐌰𐌽 sagen:

Derived forms with 𓅓 𓂋, and 𓋴 (all grammatically clear in Egypt but merged in derived languages) :
𓅓𓆓𓂧 mutter, mot
𓂋𓆓𓂧 redet…
𓋴𓆓 𓂧 sagt…

𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 𐍃𐌰𐌲𐌲𐍅𐍃 Sanges song,singing,recitation,book ⇔ 𓆓 𓂧 𓌃 𓏥
𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 𐌿𐍃𐍃𐌹𐌲𐌲𐍅𐌰𐌽 aussingen 🤍 read,recite
𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 |relate, recount, talk (of)| sagt gesagt ⇔ qiz?
𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 |relate, recount, talk (of)| spelled 𐍃𐍀𐌹𐌻𐌻𐍉𐌽

𓋴 𓆓 𓂧||© relate, recount, talk (of)|s'chat g'dice / gefasel: φασί ⇔ pthisi= ⋍ phrase
𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 𓄿||© fatten|χοντρός chontrós +++?<< shether? trashë gras groß
𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 𓏏 𓀁||description, tale|Geschichte g.Sh.chr.t / s.D.dr.th stories !
𓋴 𓆓 𓂧 𓅱 𓀁 𓏪||tales|stories Geschichte 故事 gùshì 历史 lìshǐ +++
𓊃 𓆓 𓂧 𓅓 𓀁||© make envious|system / cause-shäm
𓆓 𓂧 𓌃 𓏥||recitation|cite words ++ / chat unscharf! ßth ⇔ Schluss … -- / Schda Words / Stäbe / stabs / steps
𓆓 𓂧 𓌃 𓏤 𓏥||pronounced|cited-/ chat_ ➙ sayd nounce : 𓆓=nuun! 𓂧=ch
𓆓 𓂧 𓐝 𓌪||sting, incite|
𓆓 𓂧 𓎛 𓍢 𓂡||shut up, imprison|schd: shut her'einen ++/2
𓆓 𓂧 𓎡 𓅱 𓈗 𓈘||canal, channel|Tschadt chennel

𒅆𒌋𒌆𒌅 ši-tul-tu chat ⋍ sultation ⇔ pact
